remarks: A finite product of non-zero terms is non-zero.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jan-2018.)
statement:
fprodn0.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodn0.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fprodn0.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B =/= 0 ) $.
fprodn0 $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. A B =/= 0 ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
